name: Analyze data in a storage account

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://test0214gen2.dfs.core.chinacloudapi.cn/mlmigration/NYCTaxi/PassengerCountStats_parquetformat/part-00000-a84d0745-a2af-46e9-b7ca-83cd88e9fbe6-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
